attributes.action: Change GCSEs exam back to the old specification
attributes.additional_details: Outstanding schools failing with exam results in year 11 as the GCSE new specification has struck to them. Teachers are confused as much as stressed as they are finding it hard to teach the key information based in the syllabus. PLEASE sign the petition as it will benefit the young world to succeed in a career which determine high grades.
attributes.background: School students failing at school, as government changed the GCSE specification, were teachers are much confused as the students are. As a nation, we should come together to resolve the change, as it is effecting the nation with exam results in schools.
